alert.note: Alert for Meade; Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 10 at 11:02PM MDT until July 10 at 11:45PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM MDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL MEADE AND SOUTHEASTERN PENNINGTON COUNTIES... At 1101 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Wicksville to 5 miles east of Railroad Buttes, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... New Underwood, Wasta, Owanka, Wicksville, Farmingdale and Curlew Lake. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 77 and 98. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
